labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The muted channels are completely gone and cannot be made visible (but can be linked/entered normally), without getting 4 muted channels again.
data.short_description: Cannot uncollapse muted channels when there's less than four
data.steps_to_repro: - Mute four random channels in a server. - Collapse the list. - Enter a muted channel and then unmute it. - Exit to another channel and observe.
